summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to contracting indebtedness; authorizing and providing for the issuance and sale of limited tax general obligation bonds to pay all or part of the cost of financing elements of the City's capital improvement program, issuing and selling the bonds, and other City purposes approved by ordinance; providing for terms and sale of the bonds; creating a project fund; and amending Ordinance 121651 in connection with any future refunding of the City's general obligation bonds, including the bonds authorized herein.
